Container.Changes: [center][font size=4]unRaid-hole Change Log[/font][/center] [b]31.DEC.2015:[/b]Using HOST mode for faster performance[br][br]
Container.Name: unRaid-Hole
Container.Description: Inspired by Pi-Hole - let's block those pesky ads![br][br] This is a fork of https://github.com/arthurkay/sagittarius-A[br][br] which will become tuned to the unRaid template system.[br][br] Just set your DNS on your PC/Mac/Mobile to point to your unRaid servers IP and unRaid-hole will forward valid requests to (currently) the Google DNS servers.[br] Point your Routers DNS server address to unRaid to cover your whole network!.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]No setup required![/b] : At the moment, no config required.[br] Future options to include setting external DNS instead of Google[br] and to define additional blacklists.[br][br]
